EmailTemplate.description: Invoice/s For (Partner 'sName) SO # and Invoice # From SunPower Corporation Australia
EmailTemplate.name: Invoice/s For (Partner 'sName) SO # and Invoice # From SunPower Corporation Aust
EmailTemplate.subject: Invoice/s For (Partner 'sName) SO # and Invoice # From SunPower Corporation Australia
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello (Name of Partner),
Kindly see attached invoice/s for your SunPower order/s:
PO/SO Name : Date Delivered:
Please remit payment according to the invoice terms.
Let us know should you have any concerns or if you are unable to download your invoice.
Regards, {!User.Username} Partner Service Representative
